main event: On August 8, 1958, a round or disc-shaped object was sighted in Rapid City, South Dakota.
interesting points: The object was the size of a half-dollar and was white in color., Only one witness reported the sighting., The object traveled from northeast to southwest and disappeared instantaneously to the south., Observers noted a halo effect surrounding the object but no tail or exhaust., The observation lasted about 5-10 seconds.
